titles.title: Bureau of Corrections Renaming Act of 2015
To rename the Bureau of Prisons as the Bureau of Corrections.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
2/5/2015--Introduced. Bureau of Corrections Renaming Act of 2015
Renames the Bureau of Prisons in the Department of Justice as the Bureau of Corrections.
